text: @SpeakerPelosi @WhipClyburn The DemoRats are just now getting a Committee together for #COVID19 ??? The majority of the crisis is over . . . #Trump & the Governors are opening the country back up!!! Where have they been . . . #eatingicecream ??? 😂😂😂
